title: Guided Breathing: Awaken Your Nervous System
description:
Don't do this breathwork in water or when driving.

💨 Get my NEW free 15-day breathwork course here: https://kitarowaga.kit.com/15-day-breathwork-course
🤝 Work with Me (Coaching): https://kitarowaga.com/academy
🎓 Get my in-depth Courses: https://kitarowaga.com/courses
🧡 If you want to support me, join my Guided Breathwork Library – a vast collection of all my guided sessions and weekly live guided sessions: https://kitarowaga.com/guided-breathwork-library

--

A little bit about myself: I'm Kitaro, a breathwork instructor, Movement practitioner under Ido Portal, and former traditional Kung Fu instructor for 20 years. If you like my vibe, please subscribe to this channel. 

--
Follow me on Socials:
https://www.instagram.com/kitarowaga

https://x.com/kitarowaga

--
Timestamps (to save you some time):
00:00 Intro
00:12 Start guided Breathing

channelDescription:
Hey friends 👋, my name is Kitaro, and I teach people to breathe more fully, move more freely, think more clearly, connect more deeply, and feel more lively. 

Thank you for your support and for tagging along on my journey.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/PH7ksO89oWw" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: If you are just finding Kitaro now… he is a master of guided breathing meditation. I’ve been Wim Hof breathing for over 5 years and I’ve used many guided Wim Hof videos. HE’S THE BEST… and in the words of Wim Hof, ‘I hope you are all happy healthy and strong’.

Thank you so much 🙏

It made me believe again that there are beautiful souls out there ..
Thank you, Kitaro. This makes for such a great start to my day!

Hey kitaro, it would be nice if you put maybe 2 minutes of meditation in the end of the video where it's just pure silence. It's kind of annoying that I get interrupted by loud ads the moment the video finishes so I would appreciate it if you add this on your future videos. Cheers!

This one is my favorite, with ONE EXCEPTION: there is no verbal cue to take a deep breath at the end of last hold. With my eyes closed, I had no idea I was in overtime when I couldn’t hold it any longer! 😅
